an3.147:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an3.147:1.3: Savajjena kayakammena, savajjena vacikammena, savajjena manokammena—
an3.147:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an3.147:2.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an3.147:2.3: Anavajjena kayakammena, anavajjena vacikammena, anavajjena manokammena—
